S.FORM: == kakiliman == tabakiay diheb "Ing a kamu Grand Canyon, how-pi a kamu Ongtupqa, Ya-wa-pay a kamu Wi:kaʼi:la" tini i Amey-li-ka Ya-li-san-na sapipan nusamisa, nu Ke-low-la-tu-he micaliway tupanaay tu a lasubu emang a mihcaan tu kacedas, sakulikulit satuway, katalawan masatepad. 1979 a mihcaan tabakiay diheb mala u niliwanan a zaysang i kitakit. i ayadah nu cayay ku sikangkeyay a baziyung kitakit nu waluay tuhakay aazihan masulit tu ku ngangan nu tabakiay diheb. imahini u A-mey-lika ku mikwanay tu kanatal aidangan. 1540 a mihcaan izaw ku cacay ci Cya-si-ya·Low-peyc·te·ka-te-na-s "García López de Cárdenas" a Si-pang-ya a tademaw saayaway pakazih tu tabakiay diheb. 19 se-ci 70 a ziday, Amey-li-ka tukusay a hitay saw-wi ci Ye-han·wi-s-li·paw-wi-al mikelid tu saayaway a nu ke-sye nu miasihay a kaput tayza i tabakiay a diheb. paw-wi-al patinaku tu dihebay nu maleneknekay nu sadangay a ba'tu mahiza "u belih nu cudadan a kungku". saca, nuayawan izaw tu ku Mey-cow a In-ti-an a tademaw i tepad nu diheb mana'nel tu. 1540年,一個名叫加西亞·羅培茲·德·卡德納斯(García López de Cárdenas) . hekal a lala' 地理環境 tabakiay diheb sailabuay 1900 a depah. Makay Li-se a sacumud "Lee's Ferry" katukuh Han-s-syen-tan "Hance Rapid" yadiheb haymaw sa matikenih, tahkal tu ku sadang nu ba'tu. makay sasa nu diheb katukuh i tukun miduduc tu tepad tahkal tu nu ayaway han-u-ci katukuh tu maluhay a ziday kasasilac nu ba'tu, mahapinang ku kasadang sadang nu ba'tu masazumazuma ku kulit, sinamihcaan tu ku lala' situngusay tu maliwanay i ba'tu nu mauzipay. diheb cayay tu kacacayat tu Ke-lan-te-wa-sen-ay "Grand Wash Fault". . tabakiay diheb u lilis u kilakilangan, milakui' tayza i diheban akuti' tuway, katukuh isasa ku likelikenan, sakasa tabakiay diheban pasu tu makay kilakilang a hekal nu mauzipay. kanatal aidangan nipalumaan tu mulangawan katukuh tu1500 a lamangan, iza ku 355 a lamangan ku cilucilut, 89 a lamangan tu micucuay a aadupen, 47 a lamangan ku minabuyay a cilekay atu aadipen, 9 a lamangan tu sikuku'sy a aadupen, 17 a lamangan ku mauzipay a buting. . saka 26 ku nikala cong-tung nu A-ey-li-ka ci Ti-aw-tu·Lo-s-bu u kanamuhan aca nu katuuday tabakiay diheb, kinapina tu ciniza itini miadup tu layun nu Mey-cow anucaay mikinaul tup ala. 第26 mitahaway nu si-pang-ya西班牙探險家 su-yan 1540 a mihca 9 a bulad, si-pang-ya nu midemecay ci Ba-lan-si-s-ke·Low-pey-c·te·ke-low-na-tu patulun mikilim tu nakamuan tu Si-pow-la pitu a tukay. mahizasa, kinciw ci Cya-si-ya·Low-pey-c·te·Ka-ti-na-s mikelid tu adidi'ay a kaput Si-pang-ya a hitay atu pinaay a tademaw nu How-piy-cu u mamikelid, katukuh tu tiniay piazihan tu likelikenan "Desert View" tu mu-lye-bung "Moran Point" a laed nu tabakiay a diheb tumul a tukus. Hitay ci Pa-pu-low·te·Mey-ke-low-sa "Pablo de Melgrossa", Bu-an·Cya-le-la-s "Juan Galeras" atu zuma a hitay pasayza I sasa nu diheb mutulil pakala tut ulu hun tu cacay a zazan, nka manikaw tu nanum apanukas aca. itawyaay a Hi-pi a binacadan mikelid huntu matineng tu macapiay a katayzan i sasaay nu diheb, sisa u zuma hakay makai mikelid tu S-pang-ya tayza. Zikuz tu tusa lasubu tu a mihcaan, inayi' tu ku zumaay Ow-cow a tademaw mizizaway tu tabakiay diheb. katukuh 1776 a mihcaan, kya izaw ku tusaay bukesi nu Si-pang-ya miliyaw aca tayni tu tabakiay a diheb ci Ba-lan-s-ke·A-tana-siw·tu-min-ke "Francisco Atanasio Dominguez" a sinpu atu ci Si-al-wi-s-te·Wit-le-c·te·ay-s-ka-lan-te "Silvestre Velez de Escalante" a sinpu. itawya ku heni mikelid tu adidi'ay sakaput a hitay i satimul nu Yu-ta-cow mkilim tu malitin macapiay a Sen-ta-bey atu Cya-li-bu-ni-ya, teban nu zazan makay Ke-lun a diheb katukuh ta-li dihebay a tabakiay diheb tu saamisan a tukus. 直至1776年, (Francisco Atanasio Dominguez)神父與西爾維斯特·維勒茲·德·埃斯卡蘭特(Silvestre Velez de Escalante)神父. . mitahaway nu A-mey-lika 美國探險家 mitahaway nu A-mey-lika美國探險家 1826 a mihcaan, Tan-mu-s·e-hay-e·pa-ti "James Ohio Pattie" miladay tu cacay a kaput nu miadupay nu A-mey-lika tayza ku tiziay a atademaw, nika izaw ku nisulitan tuyni a kawaw. ci pa-ti hakay u makay S-pan-ya a bukesi zikuz muliyaw mizizaw tu tabakiay diheban u saayaway nu Ow-cow a tademaw. 19 se-ci-con-yeg, cacay ku mu-me-cyew bukesi ci Ya-ke·han-pu-lin "Jacob Hamblin" mapaculcul nu zumaay a kiwkay tayza i tabakiay a diheb mikilim tu tatungusay kitizaan mibalat milakui' tu Ke-low-lw-tu-he. Ciniza atu tizaay a binacadan atu salengacay a tademaw mana'nel kapah ku nikalabelaw, uyza i 1858 a mihcaan maazih ku Li-s a sacumud atu Pi-al-s a sacumud "Pierce Ferry" zikuz ci Ha-li-sen·Pi-al-s "Harrison Pierce" ku mikawaway a pangangan" uyni tukus ku tabakiay diheb tusa dada' ku sacumud. 19 ·漢布林(Jacob Hamblin) (Pierce Ferry,後由哈里森·皮爾斯(Harrison Pierce) (Joseph Ives) . zikuz "mitesekay nu mitahaway" misetu tu ungcung, sisa ales han tu. ci Ay-li-s mikelid aca tu misakaputay pazawali mumul, mala u saayaway nu micumuday tu budawan a sauwac "Diamond Creek" I likid nu nanu amiduduc tu tabakiay diheb timul a tukus pasawaliay muculil Ow-cow a tademaw. 之後" . likisi nu ayzaay aziday 近代歷史 1956 a mihcaan, tabakiay diheb iyawya A-mey-lik nu misiwbayay a hikuki i kitakit u pihacangay nu mahetikay a hikuki. 6 a bulad 30 a demiad tu sananal, cacay A-mey-lika hwan-ciw hikuki a kusi "TWA" "Low-ke-si-te u kapahay a pienengan" "Lockheed Super Constellation" labangay a hikuki atu cacay A-mey-lika kapulung hikuki a kusi "taw-ke-la-s DC-7 "Douglas DC-7" a hikuki 3 satulil ku laed ayaw makay Low-sen-ci a pahikukian "Los Angeles International Airport" mubalel pasawali mubahel. 1956年, "(Lockheed Super Constellation) DC-7" (Los Angeles International Airport)起飛向東部飛行. pakala tu 90 a saculilan, u nipaazih i pabaw tu tusaay a hikuki masasetul i tapuku nu tabakiay a diheb, kinapeci' mahetik i nuwalian nu diheb,micapi tu Ke-low-la-tu a sauwac atu kasacubelis nu adidi'ay a Ke-low-la-tu a sauwac. 128 ku mapatayay nu tademaw, tusa a hikukian nu pacililay atu mikawaway mahamin mapatay. caay ku timulan atukus nu diheb "palalecad tu talakaw macaliway ku 2134 depah"pihibangan piadihan midang dada', manamuh tu nu katulay a kakelic mipalid muculil. muculilay miliwku, mikacaway tu low atu miduduc tu sauwac mapalil katukuh isasa nu duheb, uyzasa, pizateng lalaedan muculil, uyza u isasaay a diheb nu akuti' katalawan amawalak, situngusay mikuwan caay pisulul pananukay tu cacay a demiad. kanakatu duduc tu tukas miluwku pihaymawitu muculil, caay kaibatad izaw ku nipatizeng tu aazihan a payay.

== kakiliman == tabakiay diheb "Ing a kamo Grand Canyon, how-pi a kamo Ongtopqa, Ya-wa-pay a kamo Wi:kaʼi:la" tini i Amey-li-ka Ya-li-san-na sapipan nosamisa, no Ke-low-la-to-he micaliway topanaay to a lasobo emang a mihcaan to kacedas, sakolikolit satoway, katalawan masatepad. 1979 a mihcaan tabakiay diheb mala o niliwanan a zaysang i kitakit. i ayadah no cayay ko sikangkeyay a baziyong kitakit no waloay tohakay aazihan masolit to ko ngangan no tabakiay diheb. imahini o A-mey-lika ko mikwanay to kanatal aidangan. 1540 a mihcaan izaw ko cacay ci Cya-si-ya·Low-peyc·te·ka-te-na-s "García López de Cárdenas" a Si-pang-ya a tademaw saayaway pakazih to tabakiay diheb. 19 se-ci 70 a ziday, Amey-li-ka tokosay a hitay saw-wi ci Ye-han·wi-s-li·paw-wi-al mikelid to saayaway a no ke-sye no miasihay a kapot tayza i tabakiay a diheb. paw-wi-al patinako to dihebay no maleneknekay no sadangay a ba'to mahiza "o belih no codadan a kongko". saca, noayawan izaw to ko Mey-cow a In-ti-an a tademaw i tepad no diheb mana'nel to. 1540年,一個名叫加西亞·羅培茲·德·卡德納斯(García López de Cárdenas) . hekal a lala' 地理環境 tabakiay diheb sailaboay 1900 a depah. Makay Li-se a sacomod "Lee's Ferry" katokoh Han-s-syen-tan "Hance Rapid" yadiheb haymaw sa matikenih, tahkal to ko sadang no ba'to. makay sasa no diheb katokoh i tokon midodoc to tepad tahkal to no ayaway han-o-ci katokoh to malohay a ziday kasasilac no ba'to, mahapinang ko kasadang sadang no ba'to masazomazoma ko kolit, sinamihcaan to ko lala' sitongosay to maliwanay i ba'to no maozipay. diheb cayay to kacacayat to Ke-lan-te-wa-sen-ay "Grand Wash Faolt". . tabakiay diheb o lilis o kilakilangan, milakoi' tayza i diheban akoti' toway, katokoh isasa ko likelikenan, sakasa tabakiay diheban paso to makay kilakilang a hekal no maozipay. kanatal aidangan nipalomaan to molangawan katokoh to1500 a lamangan, iza ko 355 a lamangan ko cilocilot, 89 a lamangan to micocoay a aadopen, 47 a lamangan ko minaboyay a cilekay ato aadipen, 9 a lamangan to sikoko'sy a aadopen, 17 a lamangan ko maozipay a boting. . saka 26 ko nikala cong-tong no A-ey-li-ka ci Ti-aw-to·Lo-s-bo o kanamohan aca no katooday tabakiay diheb, kinapina to ciniza itini miadop to layon no Mey-cow anocaay mikinaol top ala. 第26 mitahaway no si-pang-ya西班牙探險家 so-yan 1540 a mihca 9 a bolad, si-pang-ya no midemecay ci Ba-lan-si-s-ke·Low-pey-c·te·ke-low-na-to patolon mikilim to nakamoan to Si-pow-la pito a tokay. mahizasa, kinciw ci Cya-si-ya·Low-pey-c·te·Ka-ti-na-s mikelid to adidi'ay a kapot Si-pang-ya a hitay ato pinaay a tademaw no How-piy-co o mamikelid, katokoh to tiniay piazihan to likelikenan "Desert View" to mo-lye-bong "Moran Point" a laed no tabakiay a diheb tomol a tokos. Hitay ci Pa-po-low·te·Mey-ke-low-sa "Pablo de Melgrossa", Bo-an·Cya-le-la-s "Joan Galeras" ato zoma a hitay pasayza I sasa no diheb motolil pakala tot olo hon to cacay a zazan, nka manikaw to nanom apanokas aca. itawyaay a Hi-pi a binacadan mikelid honto matineng to macapiay a katayzan i sasaay no diheb, sisa o zoma hakay makai mikelid to S-pang-ya tayza. Zikoz to tosa lasobo to a mihcaan, inayi' to ko zomaay Ow-cow a tademaw mizizaway to tabakiay diheb. katokoh 1776 a mihcaan, kya izaw ko tosaay bokesi no Si-pang-ya miliyaw aca tayni to tabakiay a diheb ci Ba-lan-s-ke·A-tana-siw·to-min-ke "Francisco Atanasio Domingoez" a sinpo ato ci Si-al-wi-s-te·Wit-le-c·te·ay-s-ka-lan-te "Silvestre Velez de Escalante" a sinpo. itawya ko heni mikelid to adidi'ay sakapot a hitay i satimol no Yo-ta-cow mkilim to malitin macapiay a Sen-ta-bey ato Cya-li-bo-ni-ya, teban no zazan makay Ke-lon a diheb katokoh ta-li dihebay a tabakiay diheb to saamisan a tokos. 直至1776年, (Francisco Atanasio Domingoez)神父與西爾維斯特·維勒茲·德·埃斯卡蘭特(Silvestre Velez de Escalante)神父. . mitahaway no A-mey-lika 美國探險家 mitahaway no A-mey-lika美國探險家 1826 a mihcaan, Tan-mo-s·e-hay-e·pa-ti "James Ohio Pattie" miladay to cacay a kapot no miadopay no A-mey-lika tayza ko tiziay a atademaw, nika izaw ko nisolitan toyni a kawaw. ci pa-ti hakay o makay S-pan-ya a bokesi zikoz moliyaw mizizaw to tabakiay diheban o saayaway no Ow-cow a tademaw. 19 se-ci-con-yeg, cacay ko mo-me-cyew bokesi ci Ya-ke·han-po-lin "Jacob Hamblin" mapacolcol no zomaay a kiwkay tayza i tabakiay a diheb mikilim to tatongosay kitizaan mibalat milakoi' to Ke-low-lw-to-he. Ciniza ato tizaay a binacadan ato salengacay a tademaw mana'nel kapah ko nikalabelaw, oyza i 1858 a mihcaan maazih ko Li-s a sacomod ato Pi-al-s a sacomod "Pierce Ferry" zikoz ci Ha-li-sen·Pi-al-s "Harrison Pierce" ko mikawaway a pangangan" oyni tokos ko tabakiay diheb tosa dada' ko sacomod. 19 ·漢布林(Jacob Hamblin) (Pierce Ferry,後由哈里森·皮爾斯(Harrison Pierce) (Joseph Ives) . zikoz "mitesekay no mitahaway" miseto to ongcong, sisa ales han to. ci Ay-li-s mikelid aca to misakapotay pazawali momol, mala o saayaway no micomoday to bodawan a saowac "Diamond Creek" I likid no nano amidodoc to tabakiay diheb timol a tokos pasawaliay mocolil Ow-cow a tademaw. 之後" . likisi no ayzaay aziday 近代歷史 1956 a mihcaan, tabakiay diheb iyawya A-mey-lik no misiwbayay a hikoki i kitakit o pihacangay no mahetikay a hikoki. 6 a bolad 30 a demiad to sananal, cacay A-mey-lika hwan-ciw hikoki a kosi "TWA" "Low-ke-si-te o kapahay a pienengan" "Lockheed Soper Constellation" labangay a hikoki ato cacay A-mey-lika kapolong hikoki a kosi "taw-ke-la-s DC-7 "Dooglas DC-7" a hikoki 3 satolil ko laed ayaw makay Low-sen-ci a pahikokian "Los Angeles International Airport" mobalel pasawali mobahel. 1956年, "(Lockheed Soper Constellation) DC-7" (Los Angeles International Airport)起飛向東部飛行. pakala to 90 a sacolilan, o nipaazih i pabaw to tosaay a hikoki masasetol i tapoko no tabakiay a diheb, kinapeci' mahetik i nowalian no diheb,micapi to Ke-low-la-to a saowac ato kasacobelis no adidi'ay a Ke-low-la-to a saowac. 128 ko mapatayay no tademaw, tosa a hikokian no pacililay ato mikawaway mahamin mapatay. caay ko timolan atokos no diheb "palalecad to talakaw macaliway ko 2134 depah"pihibangan piadihan midang dada', manamoh to no katolay a kakelic mipalid mocolil. mocolilay miliwko, mikacaway to low ato midodoc to saowac mapalil katokoh isasa no doheb, oyzasa, pizateng lalaedan mocolil, oyza o isasaay a diheb no akoti' katalawan amawalak, sitongosay mikowan caay pisolol pananokay to cacay a demiad. kanakato dodoc to tokas milowko pihaymawito mocolil, caay kaibatad izaw ko nipatizeng to aazihan a payay.
